title: "Scallop-derived Plasmalogens Enhance Memory and Learning in Mice: the Mechanism Elucidated"
excerpt: "Of particular note is that scallop-derived plasmalogens abundantly contain DHA-rich plasmalogens, thereby having higher functionality. Key findings are as follows: Oral administration of scallop-derived plasmalogens increased hippocampal plasmalogens and thus enhanced memory and learning in mice,"
